name: Chicken Biryani
steps: Marinate chicken with spices and yogurt.
Soak rice for 30 minutes.
Cook chicken in a large pot.
Boil rice separately until 70% done.
Layer rice and chicken, add fried onions.
Cover and cook on low flame for 20 minutes.

name: Spaghetti Pasta
steps: Boil spaghetti until al dente.
Prepare sauce with tomatoes, garlic, and herbs.
Mix cooked pasta with the sauce.
Cook for another 5 minutes.
Serve with grated cheese on top.

name: Veggie Salad
steps: Chop fresh vegetables (lettuce, cucumber, tomato).
Add corn and beans.
Mix olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper for dressing.
Toss vegetables with dressing.
Chill before serving.

name: Chicken Noodles
steps: Boil noodles and set aside.
Stir-fry chicken with soy sauce and garlic.
Add vegetables like carrots and bell peppers.
Add noodles to the pan and mix well.
Cook for 5 more minutes and serve hot.

name: Tomato Soup
steps: Chop tomatoes and boil them.
Blend boiled tomatoes with garlic and basil.
Strain and cook the soup.
Add salt, pepper, and a bit of cream.
Serve hot with croutons.

name: Chocolate Dessert
steps: Melt dark chocolate and butter together.
Beat eggs and sugar until fluffy.
Combine chocolate with egg mixture.
Pour into molds and bake.
Cool and serve with whipped cream.

name: Paneer Tikka
steps: Marinate paneer cubes with yogurt and spices.
Thread onto skewers with veggies.
Grill or bake until charred.
Serve with green chutney.

name: Beef Tacos
steps: Cook minced beef with taco seasoning.
Warm taco shells.
Fill with beef, lettuce, tomato, cheese.
Serve with salsa or sour cream.

name: Mushroom Risotto
steps: Saute onions and garlic in butter.
Add mushrooms and arborio rice.
Gradually add broth, stirring often.
Finish with cheese and herbs.

name: Paneer Butter Masala
steps: Heat butter and sauté onions until golden.
Add tomatoes, spices, and cook into a thick gravy.
Blend the gravy smooth, return to pan.
Add paneer cubes and simmer for 10 minutes.
Garnish with cream and coriander before serving.

name: Chicken Quesadilla
steps: Cook chicken with spices in a pan.
Layer chicken and cheese between tortillas.
Grill or toast until golden and crispy.
Cut into wedges and serve with salsa.

name: Mushroom Alfredo Pasta
steps: Cook pasta and set aside.
Sauté mushrooms in butter.
Add cream and parmesan to make sauce.
Toss pasta in sauce and cook for 5 mins.
Serve hot with parsley garnish.
